title: all: copy & paste errors in tests
body:
The following lines of code either have copy & paste errors or redundant comparisons:

```
/usr/lib/go/src/encoding/gob/codec_test.go:1256:5: identical expressions on the left and right side of the '!=' operator
/usr/lib/go/src/encoding/gob/codec_test.go:1283:5: identical expressions on the left and right side of the '!=' operator
/usr/lib/go/src/net/conn_test.go:46:6: identical expressions on the left and right side of the '||' operator
/usr/lib/go/src/net/mockserver_test.go:228:5: identical expressions on the left and right side of the '||' operator
```

All position information are for Go 1.6.2
